#summary PRect Class

= Introduction =

This class stores a rectangle data as top, left, bottom, right in pixels

*Examples of use:*

{{{
rectangle = PRect("1,02,-03,40")
print rectangle #will print (1,2,-3,40)
t = rectangle.top
l = rectangle.left
b = rectangle.bottom
r = rectangle.right
}}}

As seen above, negative integer are valid. Float numbers are not.
